details.arabic_diacless: انى عذت بربى وربكم من كل متكبر لا يؤمن بيوم الحساب
details.arabic: اِنِّىۡ عُذۡتُ بِرَبِّىۡ وَرَبِّكُمۡ مِّنۡ كُلِّ مُتَكَبِّرٍ لَّا يُؤۡمِنُ بِيَوۡمِ الۡحِسَابِ
details.transliteration: innee AAuthtubirabbee warabbikum min kulli mutakabbirin la yu/minubiyawmi alhisab
details.translations: Indeed, I have sought refuge in my Lord and your Lord from every arrogant one who does not believe in the Day of Account."
